document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">South </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">winds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">jostle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Bumblebees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Hover </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">hesitate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">Drink </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Butterflies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">pause </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">passage </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Cashmere </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">softly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">plucking </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Present </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">here </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: South winds jostle them
